trans-unit.target: TEXT_CLSWVR011_00534_SEQ_00<tab>Maronne wishes you to reaffirm your desire to join the Weavers' Guild.
TEXT_CLSWVR011_00534_SEQ_01<tab>Maronne bids you present yourself to the man in charge of guild operations, a towering Roegadyn named Redolent Rose.

TEXT_CLSWVR011_00534_SEQ_02<tab>Redolent Rose grants you leave to study weaving. After providing you with a sewing needle, he instructs you to hold it as you would if you were about to attempt a stitch, and present yourself for inspection.
TEXT_CLSWVR011_00534_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Redolent Rose.
TEXT_CLSWVR011_00534_MARONNE_000<tab>Are you ready to meet the guildmaster? First impressions are everything, and you do <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> want to present yourself poorly.
TEXT_CLSWVR011_00534_MARONNE_010<tab>I suspected you might need more time. Very well─I shall not rush you.
TEXT_CLSWVR011_00534_MARONNE_011<tab>Pray return when you have prepared yourself sufficiently. We will be here.
TEXT_CLSWVR011_00534_MARONNE_020<tab>Excellent! Though I do wonder if your attire is appropriate for the occasion...
TEXT_CLSWVR011_00534_MARONNE_021<tab>You will find the esteemed Redolent Rose supervising guild operations over yonder.
TEXT_CLSWVR011_00534_MARONNE_022<tab>He is... How shall I put this? He is...relentless in his pursuit of excellence.
TEXT_CLSWVR011_00534_MARONNE_023<tab>So long as you demonstrate that you are similarly committed, he will treat you fairly and with respect.
TEXT_CLSWVR011_00534_REDOLENTROSE_000<tab>What do we have here? Another adventurer in search of thrills and excitement?

TEXT_CLSWVR011_00534_REDOLENTROSE_001<tab>Shall I dance you a merry jig? No? Well, if this fails to please you, I suggest you run along─perhaps the women of the Ruby Road Exchange will be more to your liking.
TEXT_CLSWVR011_00534_REDOLENTROSE_002<tab>...Oh, so you mean to become a weaver? Then we have something to discuss after all.

TEXT_CLSWVR011_00534_REDOLENTROSE_003<tab>I shall be blunt─weaving is an art, and, like all true artists, we must make sacrifices and suffer for our craft. So tell me, adventurer: are you prepared to <var 1A 02 /var>suffer<var 1A 01 /var>?
TEXT_CLSWVR011_00534_SYSTEM_Q0<tab>Are you prepared to suffer?
TEXT_CLSWVR011_00534_SYSTEM_A0<tab>Yes
TEXT_CLSWVR011_00534_SYSTEM_A1<tab>No
TEXT_CLSWVR011_00534_REDOLENTROSE_010<tab>Then why are you here? Don't you know what you want? Or is it that you don't like what getting what you want entails? Either way, I don't want you.
TEXT_CLSWVR011_00534_REDOLENTROSE_020<tab>So you say, but only time will tell.
TEXT_CLSWVR011_00534_REDOLENTROSE_021<tab>In any case, you'll need equipment to get started. This needle should suffice for now.
TEXT_CLSWVR011_00534_REDOLENTROSE_022<tab>I need not explain what a needle is, I trust?
TEXT_CLSWVR011_00534_REDOLENTROSE_023<tab>Good. Then hold it as you would when sewing, and show me you're ready to begin.
TEXT_CLSWVR011_00534_SYSTEM_030<tab>You have unlocked a new class! You can change to this class at any time by equipping the tool received from this quest.

TEXT_CLSWVR011_00534_SYSTEM_031<tab>When changing classes, <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>gear sets<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will allow you to register and save your equipment. You may then use them to switch between classes instantly without the need to manually equip weapons or equipment.

TEXT_CLSWVR011_00534_SYSTEM_032<tab>A button for the Gear Set interface is located in the upper portion of the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Character<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> window.
